item.title: Life Plan
item.description: View Life Plan in Taper Issue #9 Folders are the perfect place to formulate a plan to accommodate all of the possibilities: how to proceed with a project, a future, a life. What other paths can be imagined? Choosing one folder enters you into a new realm, closed off to the other branches and revealing new directions. Can a life be planned out in your file explorer? Current work is on streamlining the creation process and including actual files.

item.title: Polanimation
item.description: Part of a research effort guided by Ticha Sethapakdi Polanimation explores how polarizers can be used as a passive display technology. The goal of Polanimation is to develop a design tool and fabrication process that allows users to create animated displays that take advantage of this effect. Can we design displays that are non-intrusive? Advertisements that can be filtered by viewers rather than the owners of the billboards? Polarizers are optical filters that allow only specific wavelengths of light to pass through.
